item.title: Trump says new semiconductor tariff plan coming as soon as next week
item.description: Trump's announcement on CNBC's "Squawk Box" came on the heels of him unveiling new tariff rates on numerous countries, with some facing steep hikes.

item.title: Trump administration to formally axe Elon Musk's 'five things' email
item.description: The Trump administration plans to formally axe a program launched by Elon Musk requiring employees to summarize their five workplace achievements week...

item.title: Murdoch to provide Trump health updates in deal to delay Epstein case deposition
item.description: President Donald Trump is suing Rupert Murdoch over a Wall Street Journal article about a birthday letter Trump allegedly sent Jeffrey Epstein.

item.title: U.S. trade deficit hits a nearly 2-year low in June; China gap plunges
item.description: The U.S. trade deficit narrowed in June due to a decline in consumer goods imports due to tariffs.

item.title: Watch now: President Donald Trump joins 'Squawk Box'
item.description: Trump's interview comes as the administration juggles a slew of tariff negotiations as well as new U.S. jobs data.
